channel.title: Visual Basic on The Programmer's Ephemeris
channel.description: Recent content in Visual Basic on The Programmer's Ephemeris

item.title: Strings.LTrim
item.description: Leading whitespace can be removed from strings in Visual Basic using the LTrim method. Dim TestString As String = " Extra spaces" Dim TrimString As String TrimString = LTrim(TestString) ' Output ' Extra spaces

item.title: Strings.RTrim
item.description: Trailing whitespace can be removed from strings in Visual Basic using the RTrim method. Dim TestString As String = "Extra spaces " Dim TrimString As String TrimString = RTrim(TestString) ' Output ' Extra spaces

item.title: Strings.Trim
item.description: Leading and trailing whitespace can be removed from strings in Visual Basic using the Trim method. Dim TestString As String = " Extra spaces " Dim TrimString As String TrimString = Trim(TestString) ' Output ' Extra spaces
